Class Resource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kocakosm.pitaya.io.Resource

extends Object
    A classpath resource.
    Author:
    Osman KOCAK

    • Method Detail

      • find

        public static Resource find(String name)
        Finds and returns the resource having the given name using the context class loader. Note that if the context class loader is null, the class loader that loaded this class will be used instead.
        Parameters:
        name - the resource's name.
        Returns:
        the requested resource.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if name is null.
        Resource.NotFoundException - if the resource can't be found.

      • find

        public static Resource find(String name,
                            Class<?> contextClass)
        Finds and returns the resource having the given name (relative to the specified class).
        Parameters:
        name - the resource's name.
        contextClass - the context class.
        Returns:
        the requested resource.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if name is null.
        Resource.NotFoundException - if the resource can't be found.

      • getURL

        public URL getURL()
        Returns this resource's URL.
        Returns:
        this resource's URL.

      • copyTo

        public void copyTo(OutputStream out)
            throws IOException
        Copies the content of this resource to the specified stream.
        Parameters:
        out - the stream to copy to.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if out is null.
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the process.

      • copyTo

        public void copyTo(Writer out,
                   Charset charset)
            throws IOException
        Copies the content of this resource to the specified stream.
        Parameters:
        out - the stream to copy to.
        charset - the charset to use.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if one of the arguments is null.
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the process.

      • read

        public byte[] read()
            throws IOException
        Reads and returns this resource's content as a byte[].
        Returns:
        this resource's content.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the process.

      • read

        public String read(Charset charset)
            throws IOException
        Reads and returns this resource's content as a String.
        Parameters:
        charset - the charset to use.
        Returns:
        this resource's content.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if charset is null.
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the process.

      • readLines

        public List<String> readLines(Charset charset)
                       throws IOException
        Reads and returns all this resource's lines. Note that the returned List is immutable.
        Parameters:
        charset - the charset to use.
        Returns:
        this resource's lines.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if charset is null.
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the process.
